text:
Started tomcat 6.0.32, and then access web app, got a NullPointExceptions.
>>>>>>Logs:

Is this a tomcat bug?
creator: kevinserver@sina.com
markt@apache.org
text: You have a bug in your application. Please use the Tomcat users mailing list for further assistance.
